experience: You and Brett M. both know Russell P Reeder, Ketan Patel, and 16 others
If you have sometime tomorrow Wednesday, please join Greg Fresquez with Phoenix International Raceway, Jerry Romo with Arizona Diamondbacks, y un servidor (yours truly) on Latinx In Sports Marketing!

Honored to introduce OVH US to our EMEA customers and partners at OVH Summit. Enjoyed explaining how OVH has reinvented Cloud Hosting and now entering the US with our innovative technology as a Global Hyper-Scale Cloud Provider.

Ray O’Farrell, EVP and CTO of VMware did a great job explaining our long and successful partnership, vCLoud Air aquisition and how HCX will continue to drive our success with our 27 software driven data centers.

Adam Lashinsky , Octave Klaba , Ray O'Farrell , Ajay Patel , Allwyn Sequeira , David Wigglesworth , Brian Kuhn , Dean Gels , Scott Brown , Carolyn Kress , Patty Fisher , Robert Gregory , Alexandra Skaggs

Phoenix Rising FC is the highest-level professional soccer franchise in Arizona’s history. Established in 2013, the club enters its fourth year in the United Soccer League, which has been awarded Division 2 status by the U.S. Soccer Federation.Major League Soccer (MLS) recently announced Phoenix Rising FC as among 12 applicants being considered for a MLS Expansion Franchise. Phoenix Rising FC sold-out all three home matches played so far during the 2017 season with standing room only crowds in its new, soccer-specific stadium located at the northwest corner of the 101 and 202 freeways in south Scottsdale.  The Team recently welcomed as a player and owner, Didier Drogba, one of the most accomplished players in the history of the game.

Benevolent Capital Partners (“BCP”) is an alternative investment firm focused on investing in well-managed businesses and unique real estate properties. We work with talented management teams to develop businesses and properties that have potential for significant growth and we are actively involved in helping to build long-term value.The firm focuses on three distinct groups including: traditional Private Equity, Real Estate and Venture Capital. In private equity, we invest in profitable, growing small-to-mid market companies with strong business models, records of revenue and earnings growth and the leadership capable of sustaining that growth. In real estate, we focus on technical and distinguished developments including land aggregation, site repositioning and entitlement, renovation of older buildings and infill projects. In venture capital, we focus on partnering with dynamic, scalable platforms which have unique placement within growth industries.
Member of the Board of Trustees

Choate Rosemary Hall is a coeducational boarding and day school for grades 9-12 and a post-graduate year. A rigorous academic curriculum with an emphasis on character formation is at the core of the School's mission. The school was founded in 1890 and is based in Wallingford, Connecticut.

TerraCycle makes affordable, eco-friendly products from a wide range of non-recyclable waste materials. With over 100 products available at major retailers, TerraCycle is one of the fastest growing eco-friendly manufacturers in the world.
Managing Director - Technology and Content Division

Zealot Networks is a media and entertainment company dedicated to producing and delivering unique content to passionate audiences worldwide. The company is poised to lead the next chapter in the ever-evolving media landscape through its innovative and flexible approach to content creation, distribution and monetization.
Pepperdine University, The George L. Graziadio School of Business and Management
Member of the Board of Visitors, Senior Fellow in Entrepreneurship, 2010 to Present

Brett was instrumental in leading a major turnaround at Targus.  Prior to Brett's appointment as President, the Company was facing bankruptcy, a failed merger, falling sales, and major legal issues.  Brett's leadership as President was the key reason why Targus was able to "right the ship."   He is a very personable person who has an open door policy. He understands the meaning of credibility, is very intelligent, and is a great leader.
